verses.name: Proverbs 9:1
verses.text: Wisdom hath builded her house, she hath hewn out her seven pillars:

verses.name: Proverbs 9:2
verses.text: She hath killed her beasts; she hath mingled her wine; she hath also furnished her table.

verses.name: Proverbs 9:3
verses.text: She hath sent forth her maidens: she crieth upon the highest places of the city,

verses.name: Proverbs 9:4
verses.text: Whoso is simple, let him turn in hither: as for him that wanteth understanding, she saith to him,

verses.name: Proverbs 9:5
verses.text: Come, eat of my bread, and drink of the wine which I have mingled.

verses.name: Proverbs 9:6
verses.text: Forsake the foolish, and live; and go in the way of understanding.
